<title level="1" right="Rules">[Specific Magic Armor](/Rules.aspx?ID=714)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 557 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
These suits of armor have abilities far different from what can be gained by etching runes. A specific magic armor lists its [fundamental runes](/equipment/runes/fundamental-armor-runes), which you can upgrade, add, or transfer as normal. You can't etch or transfer any [property runes](/equipment/runes/armor-property-runes) onto a specific armor that it doesn't already have or remove its property runes.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
